lead_paragraph: Apple, IBM and Microsoft are among 53 companies urging the Supreme Court to rule that a transgender teenager has the right to use the boys' bathroom at his Virginia high school.
snippet: Apple, IBM and Microsoft are among 53 companies urging the Supreme Court to rule that a transgender teenager has the right to use the boys' bathroom at his Virginia high school....

headline.main: Apple, IBM, Microsoft Back Transgender Teen at Supreme Court
headline.print_headline: Apple, IBM, Microsoft Back Transgender Teen at Supreme Court
